text: Lake Placid 2 is a 2007 American made-for-television comedy horror movie directed by David Flores. It is a sequel to Lake Placid (1999) and the second installment in the Lake Placid movie series, telling the story of man-eating crocodiles who terrorize the local community. The movie premiered on April 28, 2007 on the Sci-Fi Channel. It was released direct to video on January 29, 2008. == Other websites == * Category:2007 comedy movies Category:2007 horror movies Category:2000s monster movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American horror movies Category:American monster movies Category:Comedy horror movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies about crocodiles Category:Movies set in Maine Category:Lake Placid movies
title: Lake Placid 2
